edu.biu.scapi.primitives.trapdoorPermutation

Class ScRabinKeyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.KeyFactorySpi
      • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.trapdoorPermutation.ScRabinKeyFactory

  • public class ScRabinKeyFactory
extends java.security.KeyFactorySpi
    KeyFactory for Rabin keys. Translates Rabin keys to RabinKeySpec and vice versa.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

      T      		 engineGetKeySpec(java.security.Key key, java.lang.Class<T> keySpec)

      • engineGetKeySpec

        public <T extends java.security.spec.KeySpec> T engineGetKeySpec(java.security.Key key,
                                                                 java.lang.Class<T> keySpec)
                                                          throws java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        Returns the KeySpec corresponding to the given key. The returned KeySpec will be of type T, if that is a valid KeySpec for the given key
        Specified by:
        engineGetKeySpec in class java.security.KeyFactorySpi
        Throws:
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - if keyDpec is not a valid KeySpec for the given key or if the given key is not a valid rabin key
